Title: Relates to allowing student-athletes to earn compensation as a result of the use of that student's name, image or likeness
Summary: Relates to allowing student-athletes to earn compensation as a result of the use of that student's name, image or likeness; prohibits an athlete or college from being prevented from participating in intercollegiate athletics because an athlete receives compensation; provides that a college shall not provide a prospective athlete with compensation in relation to the athlete's name, image and likeness.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing student-athletes to earn compensation as a result of the use of that student's name, image or likeness
